title: Helena Yu
author: Helena Yu
created_time: December 31, 2022, 03:44:23 AMLast edit: December 31, 2022, 09:50:37 AM by Helena Yu
content: Hello everyone,I wonder why the image on the first column are smaller than the others while all of the images are have same "width=200". When I click the preview of my post, all of the images are fine, but when I post, the size on the first column is changing.Does this is a bug or there's something wrong about the BBCode?ThanksAnyway you could participate to vote in this contest.Quote from: smoothie on December 30, 2022, 09:18:48 PMContestants Gallery of XMAS Decoration Lealana Contest 11) montreal12) MoparMiningLLC3) comments.author: owlcatz
comments.body: I don't understand why this post exists - It's probably because they have different sizes/heights if you see anything I don't - I see nothing wrong there. Just lock the thread and move it to archival before you get crap for promoting a contest you entered.  Quote from: Helena Yu on December 31, 2022, 03:44:23 AMAnyway you could participate to vote in this contest.https://i.imgur.com/1cas1oq.png

comments.author: nc50lc
comments.body: Follow this guide to circumvent that bug (or smf forum limitation?): /index.php?topic=5395275.msg59916092#msg59916092There are a couple of workaround but I believe this method has cleaner result.

comments.author: NeuroticFish
